content: this is my version of falkor the luck dragon he ll end up about 2 feet long he s got lots of parts but don t worry i walk you through the steps of how to make each part and then how to sew all the pieces together with descriptions and pictures supplies 4 5mm hook a smaller hook for adding furry yarn i used 4mm but 3 5 works yarn needle for sewing in ends scissors poly fil eyes i use 15mm safety eyes wire dog brush to make mustache fuzzy i love this yarn white cranberry yarn bee snuggle up yarn white please feel free to message me if you have any questions
